General.Name: Team17
General.Description: Team17 Group plc, together with its subsidiaries, develops and publishes independent video games for digital and physical market in the United Kingdom and internationally. It operates through Games Label, Simulation, and Edutainment segments. The company develops and publishes owned and third-party IP video games; educational entertainment apps for children; and working simulation games. Team17 Group plc was founded in 1990 and is based in Wakefield, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 3 Red Hall Avenue, Wakefield, United Kingdom, WF1 2UL
